data.title: Phelps Leaves Behind Infamous Legacy In Topeka
data.meta_description: Fred Phelps, founder of the Westboro Baptist Church, died of natural causes at 11:15 p.m., March15 in hospice care. He was 84 years old. According to his son, Nathan Phelps, his father had been excommunicated from the church, he founded prior to his death. Phelps was one of the most well- known residents of Topeka and has left
data.text: In recent years Phelps was not often seen at the protests, thought by many to be due to his age; however, many critics and academics noted a change in the church’s agenda. What was once a myopic and focused campaign against the LGBTQ community seemed to devolve into a less unified crusade against anyone outside the Westboro Baptist Church. The group’s website, www.godhatesfags.com, branched out to target new groups.
